duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer personnel policy concerning all HR activities for the assigned Micro Fulfillment site.
Provide HR support for employee engagement, performance management, and recruitment.
Develop and propose improvements to HR policies, programs, and procedures to ensure compliance with employment laws.
Maintain relationships with Employee Relations to investigate employee concerns and provide coaching to employees and management.
Facilitate positive employee experiences and maintain a team environment with open communication.
Review and manage HR data to support people processes and workforce planning.
Partner with Talent Acquisition and HR Business Partners to craft recruitment strategies and drive candidate flow.
Provide coaching to business leaders to improve engagement and ensure a consistent team member experience.
Engage with business support teams to manage workforce planning activities and guide operations in strategic talent management.
Support the implementation of HR programs, resources, and tools to optimize the workplace environment.
Work closely with operations, communications, and HR leadership to ensure content and messaging reach team members effectively.
Provide analysis of local market and talent needs to guide development of HR programs and processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree in Human Resources or related field
